Firebase Demo IntentID 1.The Log-Token button logs the token to the logcat\n2.The Send Notification Button sends the notification to the client device\n3. Subscribe to news : Client subscribes to the topic news\n4. Send Message to Topic : The server will send msg to all clients subscribed to news\n5. Send Notification: Message is sent to the client whose key is defined in CLIENT_REGISTRATION_TOKEN Send Message to Client Load Token Simulate Server Functions Simulate Client Functions
